alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Boone County through 230 PM CDT... At 200 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carrollton, or 13 miles east of Berryville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Omaha... Roberson Hollow... Alpena... New Hope in Boone County... Burlington... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
